title: Stop Ignoring This Fact About The World
description:
————————————————————
Ready to build a network of amazing women and high-status men?

Michael’s Men of Action is a one-on-one Master’s program that teaches men how to create elite 
social lives by becoming higher status.

Click this link to learn how you can have a High-Status lifestyle now:
https://m.moamentoring.com/podcast

Click here to join the Men of Action community and watch the High-Status Networking 101 course:
https://m.moamentoring.com/moa-community

Interested in joining the Men of Action sales team? Apply here:
https://www.moamentoring.com/jobs/sales

Men of Action has an affiliate program! Post pre-made content and get paid passively:
https://www.moamentoring.com/affiliate

channel_info.title: Michael Sartain
channel_info.description:
🎙Host of The Michael Sartain Podcast 

🔥Teaching you how to build a network of desirable women and high-status men

👇 Click the "Men of Action" link below now to forge a high-status lifestyle and join the elites

transcription: {"text": "If I'm an oncologist, I study cancer, but that doesn't mean I condone cancer. And if I study evolutionary psychology and I read about the plasticine epic where there was massive amounts of murder and people raiding other villages and rape and stuff like that, that doesn't mean I condone it, but to turn a blind eye to it and pretend like the world was always unicorns and fairy tales, we're doing a disservice to ourselves as a species and as a society because we're never going to be able to progress if we don't know the truth. And the truth, for the most part, as far as our psychology, is based in evolution. Evolutionary biology and evolutionary psychology. When I hear people talk about egalitarian societies and human rights and stuff like that, I'm very much in favor of that. When I talk about evolutionary psychology, that is about what is, but not what ought. What ought to be is that we all should treat each other with respect and beauty is skin deep and we should judge each other on the content of our character. What is is that we're hairless murderers. We don't do that, right? And so we have to live in both of these worlds where we can aim for this one thing and still recognize that this other thing ", "segments": [{"id": 0, "seek": 0, "start": 0.0, "end": 2.5, "text": " If
